text: This is a list of albums that reached number-one on the Irish Independent Albums Chart in 2017. The charts were compiled by Irish Recorded Music Association (IRMA). ==Chart history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:left" |+List of Irish Independent Albums Chart number-one albums of 2017 |- !
